Flicker::

Realizing they're alone, Flicker helps her up with one hand - and 
sticks his plasma rifle in her back with the other.  This could be 
his only chance.  "You're going to keep quiet and do exactly what I 
tell you, or I'll fry you and the brat."  His tone has lost all 
semblance of friendship - now he sounds just like the Predacon he is.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:

>

her

while
